mapper.insert: insert into bec_community(member_id, comu_file, comu_title, comu_content, commu_category) values (#{arg0}, #{arg1}, #{arg2}, #{arg3}, #{arg4});
mapper.delete: delete from bec_community where comu_idx in (#{comu_idx})
mapper.select: select count(*) from bec_community where comu_idx=#{arg0}
